Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Islamic \Islamic\ adj. of or pertaining to Islamism; as, Islamic art.
Syn: Muslim, Moslem. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Mohammedan \Mo*ham"med*an\, a. [From Mohammed, fr. Ar. muh['a]mmad praiseworthy, highly praised.] Of or pertaining to Mohammed, or the religion and institutions founded by Mohammed; in the latter sense, synonymous with {Islamic}, the term preferred by Moslems. [Written also {Mahometan}, {Mahomedan}, {Muhammadan}, etc.] [1913 Webster +PJC]
Islamic adj : of or relating to or supporting Islamism; "Islamic art" [syn: {Muslim}, {Moslem}]
